title: Odds of police cracking a missing persons case! NCRB 2022 data
comments: 50 % is too high for India, this data is definitely not true
punjab is even worse than up and bihar.

The issue with missing cases is, if people were found or came back on their own they won't report it back. Police would continue to search or leave it on their database to get piled up. I think it might be because of this the percentage is so low.
